ISSUE.TITLE: Wordcount in editor does not work for RTL Languages (Arabic, or Hebrew)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary If i type Arabic words, the wordcounter in editor bottom does not work. I think this applies to RTL Languages.
